description: The data center dashboard displays the latest configurations, resources status and usages percent of the data centers entities.

panels.content: ###### The data center dashboard displays the latest configurations, resources status and usages percent of the data centers entities.

panels.description: The number of clusters, hosts, virtual machines, and storage domains in the latest data center configuration.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR2 - This query returns the
-- number of cluster, hosts and vms
-- in the latest data center configuration

SELECT
    COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id ) AS cluster_count,
    COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id ) AS host_count,
    COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_4_latest_configuration_vms.vm_id ) AS vm_count
FROM 
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
            )
    LEFT OUTER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_vms
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                v4_4_latest_configuration_vms.cluster_id
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )

-- DR2- This query returns the total count of 
-- storage domains for the chosen data center
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
    COUNT ( DISTINCT v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id ) AS storage_count
FROM 
    v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
WHERE
    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )

panels.title: Data Center Entities (DR2)

panels.description:
Average percentage of CPU usage for all hosts in the selected data center. The thresholds are set at 60% and 80%.
This report shows the latest configuration.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR11 - This query returns for
-- the specific data center the average hosts
-- resources that are used ( cpu and memory )
-- in the latest data center configuration.

SELECT
    cpu_usage_percent_avg AS average_cpu_used
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            AVG ( cpu_usage_percent ) AS cpu_usage_percent_avg
        FROM 
            v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_id
                    )
            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
        WHERE
        -- Here we get only active hosts
        v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 1
        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
        AND v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
    ) AS average_cpu_percent

panels.title: Data Center Host CPU Usage (DR11)

panels.description:
Average percentage of memory usage for all hosts in the selected data center. The thresholds are set at 60% and 80%.
This report shows the latest configuration.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR11 - This query returns for
-- the specific data center the average hosts
-- resources that are used ( cpu and memory )
-- in the latest data center configuration.

SELECT
    memory_usage_percent_avg AS average_memory_used
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            AVG ( memory_usage_percent ) AS memory_usage_percent_avg
        FROM 
            v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_id
                    )
            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
                    )
        WHERE
        -- Here we get only active hosts
        v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 1
        -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
        AND v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
    ) AS average_memory_percent

panels.title: Data Center Host Memory Usage (DR11)

panels.description:
Calculates average uptime percent for all hosts. Thresholds are set to 60% and 80%.
This report shows the latest configuration for the selected data center.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR5 - This query returns the uptime percent
-- of the hosts in the chosen data center
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
    (
        SUM 
            (
                CASE
                    WHEN v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 1
                        THEN COALESCE ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status, 0 )
                    ELSE 0
                END
            ) 
        / SUM ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status )
    ) * 100 AS uptime_mins_percent
FROM 
    v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_id
            )
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id =
                v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )

panels.title: Data Center Host Uptime (DR5)

panels.description:
Calculates used disk size percent average of all storage domains attached to the selected data center. Thresholds are set to 60% and 80%.
This report shows the latest configuration.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR8 - This query returns the used disk size percent
-- of the storage domains in the chosen datacenter
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
    CASE 
        WHEN SUM ( CAST ( used_disk_size_gb AS float ) + CAST ( available_disk_size_gb AS float ) ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE 
            (
                -- Used disk size
                SUM ( CAST ( used_disk_size_gb AS float ) ) /
                -- Total disk size ( available and used )
                SUM 
                    (
                        CAST ( used_disk_size_gb AS float ) +
                        CAST ( available_disk_size_gb AS float )
                    )
            ) * 100 
    END AS used_disk_size_gb_percent
FROM 
    storage_domain_samples_history
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
        ON 
            (
                storage_domain_samples_history.storage_domain_id =
                v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
    -- Here we get the latest storage domains configuration
    AND storage_domain_samples_history.history_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM storage_domain_samples_history AS a
                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
            )

panels.title: Data Center Storage Space Usage (DR8)

panels.description: For the top 5 busiest clusters, the max and average CPU and memory usage percent.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR21 - This query returns for the top 5 busiest clusters,
-- the max and average cpu and memory usage percent.
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_name,
    AVG ( cpu_usage_percent ) AS cpu_usage_percent_avg,
    MAX ( cpu_usage_percent ) AS cpu_usage_percent_max,
    AVG ( memory_usage_percent ) AS memory_usage_percent_avg,
    MAX ( memory_usage_percent ) AS memory_usage_percent_max
FROM 
    v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_id
            )
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id =
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we get only active hosts
    v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 1
    -- Here we filter by the datacenter chosen by the user
    AND v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
GROUP BY
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_name
ORDER BY
    AVG ( cpu_usage_percent ) +
    MAX ( cpu_usage_percent ) +
    AVG ( memory_usage_percent ) +
    MAX ( memory_usage_percent ) 
    DESC
LIMIT 5

panels.title: Data Center Top 5 Busiest Clusters (DR21)

panels.description:
For the 5 clusters with the most downtime, 
the uptime,  planned downtime and unplanned downtime percent.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR16 - This query returns for the 5 clusters with the most downtime,
-- the uptime, planned downtime and unplanned downtime percent.
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_name,
    (
        SUM 
            (
                CASE
                    WHEN v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 1
                        THEN coalesce ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status, 0 )
                    ELSE 0
                END
            ) 
        / SUM ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status )
    ) * 100 AS uptime_percent,
    (
        SUM 
            (
                CASE
                    WHEN v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 2
                        THEN coalesce ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status, 0 )
                    ELSE 0
                END
            ) 
        / SUM ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status )
    ) * 100 AS planned_downtime_percent,
    (
        SUM 
            (
                CASE
                    WHEN v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 3
                        THEN coalesce ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status, 0 )
                    ELSE 0
                END
            ) 
        / SUM ( v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.minutes_in_status )
    ) * 100 AS unplanned_downtime_percent
FROM 
    v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_id
            )
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
        ON 
            (
                v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id =
                v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
GROUP BY
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_name
ORDER BY
    uptime_percent ASC,
    unplanned_downtime_percent DESC,
    planned_downtime_percent DESC
LIMIT 5

panels.title: Data Center Top 5 Clusters Host Downtime (DR16)

panels.description: Available disk size, used disk size and available disk size percentage for the 5 storage domains with the lowest available disk space.

styles.linkTooltip: Link to Storage Domains Inventory Dashboard

targets.rawSql:
-- DR26 - This query returns, for the 5 storage domains
-- with the lowest available disk space, the available disk size,
-- used disk size and available disk size percent.
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
    'No' AS is_deleted, 
    datacenter_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
    available_disk_size_gb,
    used_disk_size_gb,
    CASE 
        WHEN SUM ( CAST ( used_disk_size_gb AS float ) + CAST ( available_disk_size_gb AS float ) ) = 0
            THEN NULL
        ELSE
            ( 
                -- Available disk size
                SUM ( CAST ( available_disk_size_gb AS float ) ) /
                -- Total disk size ( available and used )
                SUM 
                    (
                        CAST ( used_disk_size_gb AS float ) +
                        CAST ( available_disk_size_gb AS float )
                    )
            ) * 100 
    END AS free_disk_size_gb_percent
FROM 
    storage_domain_samples_history
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains
        ON 
            (
                storage_domain_samples_history.storage_domain_id =
                v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
            )
    INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains
        ON 
            (
                storage_domain_samples_history.storage_domain_id =
                v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id
            )
WHERE
    -- Here we filter the datacenter chosen by the user
    v4_4_latest_map_datacenters_storage_domains.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
    -- Here we get the latest storage domains configuration
    AND storage_domain_samples_history.history_id 
        IN 
            (
                SELECT MAX ( a.history_id )
                FROM storage_domain_samples_history AS a
                GROUP BY a.storage_domain_id
            )
GROUP BY
    -- Here we calculate per storage domain
    datacenter_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_id,
    v4_4_latest_configuration_storage_domains.storage_domain_name,
    available_disk_size_gb,
    used_disk_size_gb
ORDER BY
    free_disk_size_gb_percent ASC
LIMIT 5

panels.title: Data Center Top 5 Used Storage Domains (DR26)

panels.description: The hosts average usage peaks per cluster for the selected data center, in the latest configuration.

targets.rawSql:
-- DR27 - This query returns the hosts Average Usage Peaks
-- per cluster in the chosen datacenter
-- in the latest configuration.

SELECT
--  cluster_id,
    NOW () AS "time",
    cluster_name,
    AVG ( cpu_peak ) AS "Avg. CPU Peak",
    AVG ( mem_peak ) AS "Avg. Memory Peak"
FROM 
    (
        SELECT
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_name,
            v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id,
            MAX ( cpu_usage_percent ) AS cpu_peak,
            MAX ( memory_usage_percent ) AS mem_peak
        FROM 
            v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples
            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id =
                        v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_id
                    )
            INNER JOIN v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters
                ON 
                    (
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.cluster_id =
                        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id
                    )
        WHERE
            -- Here we filter by active hosts only
            v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.host_status = 1
            -- Here we filter the datacenter chosen by the user
            AND v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.datacenter_id = CAST ( '$datacenter_id' AS UUID )
        GROUP BY
        -- Here we calculate per cluster
        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_id,
        v4_4_latest_configuration_clusters.cluster_name,
        v4_4_latest_configuration_hosts.host_id,
        DATE_PART ( 'hour', v4_4_statistics_hosts_resources_usage_samples.history_datetime )
    ) AS tbl_samples_peaks
GROUP BY cluster_id, cluster_name

panels.title: Data Center Summary of Cluster Host Resource Usage (DR27)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    datacenter_name AS __text, 
    datacenter_id AS __value 
FROM v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters
list.label: Data Center
list.name: datacenter_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    datacenter_name AS __text, 
    datacenter_id AS __value 
FROM v4_4_latest_configuration_datacenters

title: Data Center Dashboard
